constructor.details: Owner is set via Ownable(msg.sender). Requires addresses for PeoCoin and DCS contracts.

params._dcs: The address of the DCS contract.
params._peoToken: The address of the PeoCoin contract.

createProposal(string).details: Only users holding PEO can propose. The proposal is open for voting until `endTime`.

params.description: A short text describing the proposalâ€™s purpose or action.

executeProposal(uint256).details: The proposal must have enough total votes to meet `quorum` and a majority > `majorityPercentage`.

params.proposalId: The ID of the proposal to execute.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateParameters(uint256,uint256,uint256.details: Only the owner can adjust these values. This allows governance to evolve over time.

params._majorityPercentage: The new majority threshold for yes votes (in percentage).
params._quorum: The new minimum total votes required for a proposal.
params._votingPeriod: The new duration of the voting period in seconds.

vote(uint256,bool).details: Users can only vote once per proposal and only during the voting period.      Weight is determined by `dcs.getScore()`. Zero score means no voting power.

params.proposalId: The ID of the proposal to vote on.
params.support: True if voting in favor, false if voting against.

constructor.notice: Deploys the Governance contract and sets the initial owner.

createProposal(string).notice: Creates a new proposal that PEO holders can vote on.

dcs().notice: Reference to the DCS contract for computing user voting scores.

executeProposal(uint256).notice: Executes a proposal after the voting period has ended if it meets quorum and majority requirements.

hasVoted(uint256,address).notice: Tracks which users have voted on which proposals.

peoToken().notice: Reference to the PeoCoin contract for checking PEO balances.

updateParameters(uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Updates the voting parameters (period, quorum, majority).

vote(uint256,bool).notice: Casts a vote on a proposal.
